entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Lewisporte
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:45 PM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -14.2°C

Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 89 %

Dewpoint: -15.6°C

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12 except minus 16 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: A few clouds except mainly cloudy along parts of the coast this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 12 except minus 16 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 18 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early in the evening then changing to rain showers overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snowfall amount 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening then south 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 12 January 2023
